LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectHeavyMech.label: Resurrect Heavy Automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectHeavyMech.description: Resurrect a friendly automatroid from the heavy weight class. So long as the automatroid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectMediumMech.label: Resurrect Medium Automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectMediumMech.description: Resurrect a friendly Automatroid from the medium weight class. So long as the automatroid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectUltraheavyMech.label: Resurrect Ultraheavy Automatroid
LanguageData.DMS_ResurrectUltraheavyMech.description: Resurrect a friendly automatroid from the ultraheavy weight class. So long as the automatroid's body is not completely destroyed, it can be resurrected.
